description: Updates the scope of a package. Scope of the package defines users who can view and associate a package.

parameters.name: PackageID
parameters.description: ID of the package whose scope is being updated.

parameters.name: Operation
parameters.description: The operation to perform on the package scope (e.g., add/remove/override users).

parameters.name: PackageUserList
parameters.description: List of users to be added or removed from the package scope. (string) ---

nested_items.name: PackageID
nested_items.description: ID of the package whose scope was updated.

nested_items.name: Operation
nested_items.description: The operation that was performed on the package scope.

nested_items.name: PackageUserList
nested_items.description: List of users who have access to the package after the scope update.
